EmailTemplate.subject: Download the IDC White Paper - Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The debate is over. There’s no longer any question that Big Data and Analytics (BDA) has the potential to deliver transformational business value to enterprises of all types and even reinvent entire industries.
Unlocking the value of BDA is not without its challenges, however. Proponents of BDA to identify impactful initial use cases, demonstrate value to internal stakeholders, and ensure the availability of appropriately skilled staff.
Download <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics?confirmation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=idc-whitpaper-dsc-q116]]> Toward Actionable Information: Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics (BDA). We know you're likely considering all the options available for turning BDA into transformational businesses value and we appreciate the chance to show you our leading data solutions to do just that.
For more about BDA and related topics that are discussed in the white paper, please visit:
- Pivotal Big Data Suite <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite]]>: Open Source, Scale-out Data Management Portfolio - Introducing Greenplum <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse]]>: World’s First Open Source MPP Data Warehouse - Apache HAWQ <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/the-way-to-hadoop-native-sql)]]>: The Way to Hadoop-Native SQL - 2 Reasons <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/2-reasons-why-in-memory-data-grids-are-a-must-have-for-apps-at-scale]]>: Why In-Memory Data Grids Are A Must-Have For Apps at Scale
Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation by serving as a trusted partner to enterprises building, evolving, scaling and adapting to the new realities of digital transformation. Contact us <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c0p02r2I0NAU2dCJT0OHV00]]> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your BDA initiatives.
